text: Lenny Von Dohlen (December 22, 1958 â€“ July 5, 2022) was an American actor. He was best known for his role as Miles Harding in the movie Electric Dreams, and Harold Smith in the television series Twin Peaks and the spin-off movie Twin Peaks: Fire Walk With Me. Von Dohlen died on July 5, 2022 after a long-illness in Los Angeles, California at the age of 63. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Georgia (U.S. state) Category:People from Augusta, Georgia
title: Lenny Von Dohlen
